label.text: Type of Recording eg. Disabled = None, All Sub Programs = FullMux as ".ts",
Single Sub Program = TSMux as ".ts", Single Sub Program = MpgMux as ".mpg" and
Single Sub Program = SepMux as ".mv2 and ".mp2 and ".txt" and ".ac3"
